description:
Providing Premier Legal Counsel In Oakland Since 1978

Individuals and families in Oakland, California, have entrusted their legal needs to the skilled attorneys of Gwilliam, Ivary, Chiosso, Cavalli & Brewer for over 40 years. We are proud to serve members of our community when they need us most, in matters of personal injury law, employment law and business law.

Our law firm has been successful because of a longstanding commitment to giving each case and every client our best. We hope that achieving positive results for individuals, families and businesses contributes to safer, more just communities in Oakland.

Here When You Need Us Most

As an established team of trial lawyers, we have the experience and resources to handle complex cases and litigate against corporations, public entities and insurance companies — and their armies of attorneys.

We dedicate significant resources to each case we take on, committing fully to our client's goals, so we must be selective about the cases we accept. We accept only those cases where we believe we can make a significant difference for our client — and this means more than recovering money for them. We aim to make our clients whole again, securing whatever they need to move on with their lives, from compensation to job reinstatement and more.

We represent clients who have suffered from serious personal injuries or wrongful death or poor treatment on the job, such as discrimination, sexual harassment or wrongful termination. We also handle business disputes and litigation for area business owners.

When you need a lawyer in Oakland to help you through a legal challenge, we invite you to call 510-823-0323 or 866-220-1195 and schedule a free initial consultation with Gwilliam, Ivary, Chiosso, Cavalli & Brewer to learn how we can help.
